thread.title: Rosanna

author: Rosanna
title: Rosanna
text: I ordered 6 four-five foot trees-2 mulberry, 2 nectarine, and 2 loquats, as well as 4 muscadine 2 year grape vines. They all arrived in good condition, wrapped in bubble wrap and the roots wrapped in thick, moist material to keep the roots moist. I planted them the day after they arrived. It has been about 3 weeks now--most are still dormant, but looking good. The loquats arrived with large healthy leaves on them--in spite of a freeze we experienced shortly after planting them, they are still looking good.
